User Story: As a student, I want to track my academic progress and access real-time updates on course performance, so that I can stay informed and make informed decisions.
As a student, I want to download lecture slides for offline study, so that I can access educational materials without relying on digital platforms.
As a student, I want to integrate mental wellbeing forms into the system to address student mental health concerns, so that I can receive timely support.
As a student, I want to have access to a centralized database with real-time updates and analytics to better understand my academic performance.
As a student, I want to have secure communication tools to share information with professors and classmates, so that I can stay connected and collaborate effectively.
As a student, I want to have predictive analytics to identify students who are struggling with their courses, so that I can provide targeted support.
As a student, I want to have a mobile app for accessing course information and progress tracking, so that I can stay engaged with my learning.
As a student, I want to have a way to share feedback and surveys about course content and learning experiences, so that I can contribute to improving the system.
